main event: A civilian observed a single orange sphere flying in West Carrollton, Ohio on July 1, 1962.
interesting points: The object was moving at a good speed before it stopped and reversed course,The observation lasted for 2 minutes at an altitude of 4,000 feet,The object was reported to be in a straight line course,There was no physical evidence or photographs associated with the sighting,The conclusion of the report was that the object was unidentified, possibly classified as NT or RD.
